content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am pleased to be negotiating with you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that the apartment is in great condition and well located. Let's start with the rental price of 800 Euro.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That is too low for my liking. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too low. I am looking for something more in line with the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a better price, but I am still looking for more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is closer to what I am looking for, but I still believe it can be higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
That is a good price, but I believe the quality of the apartment deserves even more. 

[yourname], I agree to the price of [1300] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
